comment: стена, в которой растет растение, в карцере

languages.text: Стена, взломанная растением, состоит не только из стали, но и из слоев зеркальных пластин, призванных сдерживать психическую энергию.

traits.locale_text: Стена, взломанная растением, состоит не только из стали, но и из слоев зеркальных пластин, призванных сдерживать психическую энергию.

languages.text: The bulkhead, split open by a plant, is composed of not only steel but also layers of mirror-like lamellae designed to suppress psychic energy.
languages.original_text: Стена, взломанная растением, состоит не только из стали, но и из слоев зеркальных пластин, призванных сдерживать психическую энергию.

traits.locale_text: The bulkhead, split open by a plant, is composed of not only steel but also layers of mirror-like lamellae designed to suppress psychic energy.
The bulkhead, split open by a plant, is composed of not only steel but also layers of mirror-like lamellae designed to suppress psychic energy.
The bulkhead, split open by a plant, is composed of not only steel but also layers of mirror-like lamellae designed to suppress psychic energy.
The bulkhead, split open by a plant, is composed of not only steel but also layers of mirror-like lamellae designed to suppress psychic energy.

languages.text: 被植物挤开的舱壁由钢铁制成，上面还附有一层层镜面状的薄片，用来抑制灵能能量。
languages.original_text: The bulkhead, split open by a plant, is composed of not only steel but also layers of mirror-like lamellae designed to suppress psychic energy.

traits.locale_text: 被植物挤开的舱壁由钢铁制成，上面还附有一层层镜面状的薄片，用来抑制灵能能量。

languages.text: Esta mampara, reventada por una planta, no solo está hecha de acero sino que incorpora láminas especulares que contienen la energía psíquica.
languages.original_text: The bulkhead, split open by a plant, is composed of not only steel but also layers of mirror-like lamellae designed to suppress psychic energy.

traits.locale_text: Esta mampara, reventada por una planta, no solo está hecha de acero sino que incorpora láminas especulares que contienen la energía psíquica.

languages.text: 植物で真っ二つに割かれた隔壁は鉄鋼だけでなく、サイキック・エネルギーを抑制するために設計された鏡のようなラメラ層で構成されている。
languages.original_text: The bulkhead, split open by a plant, is composed of not only steel but also layers of mirror-like lamellae designed to suppress psychic energy.

traits.locale_text: 植物で真っ二つに割かれた隔壁は鉄鋼だけでなく、サイキック・エネルギーを抑制するために設計された鏡のようなラメラ層で構成されている。

languages.text: Das von einer Pflanze aufgesprengte Schott besteht nicht nur aus Stahl, sondern auch aus spiegelartigen Lamellen, die psionische Energie unterdrücken sollen.
languages.original_text: The bulkhead, split open by a plant, is composed of not only steel but also layers of mirror-like lamellae designed to suppress psychic energy.

traits.locale_text: Das von einer Pflanze aufgesprengte Schott besteht nicht nur aus Stahl, sondern auch aus spiegelartigen Lamellen, die psionische Energie unterdrücken sollen.

languages.text: Cette cloison, éventrée par une plante, est composée d'acier et de plusieurs couches d'un matériau semblable à des miroirs conçu pour bloquer l'énergie psychique.
languages.original_text: The bulkhead, split open by a plant, is composed of not only steel but also layers of mirror-like lamellae designed to suppress psychic energy.

traits.locale_text: Cette cloison, éventrée par une plante, est composée d'acier et de plusieurs couches d'un matériau semblable à des miroirs conçu pour bloquer l'énergie psychique.

languages.text: Bir bitki tarafından yırtılıp açılan bölme paneli yalnızca çelikten değil, aynı zamanda ruhsezi enerjisini bastırması için tasarlanan, aynaya benzer levha katmanlarından oluşuyor.
languages.original_text: The bulkhead, split open by a plant, is composed of not only steel but also layers of mirror-like lamellae designed to suppress psychic energy.

traits.locale_text: Bir bitki tarafından yırtılıp açılan bölme paneli yalnızca çelikten değil, aynı zamanda psişik enerjiyi bastırması için tasarlanan, aynaya benzer levha katmanlarından oluşuyor.
